metadata.name: Cloudy day at beach
metadata.description:
"Cloudy day at beach"

In this work i try to represent the suffocating weight of loneliness. For example the gray clouds, which fill much of the frame.

But also the fact that we are not completely alone, as the poem says: "No person is an island; the death of anyone affects me, because i am united with all humanity." 
As cold and gray as the world seemed, there will always be those willing to give us a hand


Otherwise why would the girl be posing, who would she pose for? she is posing for you my friend.

I hope you like it
